Room.Name: Secret Quick Car Transporter
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the Quick Car terminal for the City of Kista.
Room.LongDescription: The quick cars were developed by the elves to let them move around the mountains quickly and safely without having to deal with all the threats on the surface. With the help of dwarven miners and elven ingenuity, the quick cars zip through the tunnels at speeds close to 60 kilometers per hour. Hold on tight.
